name: Somewhere (itch)
description:
update 9/30/17: The story in this is not good, IMO. 

UPDATE 10/9/16: I think I have fixed everything and made some puzzles a tad clearer.

UPDATE 10/8/16: I have reduced download size, and amount of stupid things said by the character. Additionally, I have fixed a bug with a certain ending.

Somewhere, a point and click about finding out where you are.

Features:

  • Playable.
  • Pointable.
  • Clickable.
  • You can talk to people and learn information.
  • Multiple endings!

Also, I highly suggest you read the readme and look and things (maybe even multiple times...)((not specifically the same object but maybe the same thing on different screens)).

I think it's around 20-30 minutes? Maybe 10 if you're speedy.
